- **WaterMarkEraser.exe** - Standalone executable (no Python required!)

- No installation needed - just run the .exe file

## ğŸš€ How to Use

1. **Double-click** `WaterMarkEraser.exe` to launch the application
2. No Python installation required
3. No dependencies to install
4. Works on any Windows 10/11 computer

âœ… Remove UPDF watermarks  
âœ… Remove links and annotations

## ğŸ’¡ Quick Start

1. Launch WaterMarkEraser.exe
2. Add PDF files (drag & drop or click "Add Files")
3. Select cleaning options:
   - â˜‘ Remove Links
   - â˜ Remove Annotations
   - â˜ Remove Watermarks (UPDF, etc.)
4. Click "â–¶ Start Cleaning"
5. Find cleaned files in the same folder
